runs.comm: gone! Short of a length delivery on the stumps, Atapattu goes on the backfoot and pulls it away, but can only find the man out in the deep!
good length delivery on the stumps, Dilshan looks to run it down, misses
fuller length delivery on the off, Dilshan comes on the frontfoot and looks to drive, inside edges it to backward square leg
back of a length delivery on the off, kicks off the surface, Sangakkara looks to defend, misses
fuller length delivery on the off, Sangakkara comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long off
fires in a bouncer, it goes too high and over to thirdman for four
dropped! A good length delivery outside offstimp, Dilshan looks to defend, gets an edge and Fleming at first slip puts down a sitter
back of a length delivery angling into the right hander, Dilshan plays and misses
thats out! A good moving delivery slants past the left-hander, and Sangakkara drives loosely, getting a thin edge through to McGlashan, and Sri Lanka are now 55 for 5!
fuller length delivery outside  offstump, Silva opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
short of length delivery outside off stump, Dilshan takes a long look and lets it go
good length delivery outside off stump, Dilshan waits for it and shoulders arms
fuller length delivery outside off stump, Dilshan comes on the frontfoot and drives that to gully
good length delivery on the stumps, Silva looks to defend, inside edge onto the pads
full and wide outside off stump, 141ks on that, and it beats the backfoot prod
short and wide, cracked to Taylor at point and he calls for the single, the fielder's throw is quick but not good enough to nail the batsman
good length delivery down the leg, Dilshan goes on the backfoot and turns it to square leg
too full on the stumps and its driven back down the ground, the ball ricochets off the stumps and deflects away for one towards mid-on
short of length delivery outside off, Dilshan goes on the backfoot and cuts it to point
full outside off stump, driven into the covers for one, the batsmen have to run quick as the fielders converge
fullish again, driven in the gap at mid-off down to long-off for an easy single

run out! A fullish ball on middle and leg is tucked past square leg, the batsmen take one and decide on the second, but Fulton in the deep is quick and fires in the throw to McGlashan, and Silva is just too slow coming back, there really was no second run on offer, and indecision is the culprit
good length, moving outside off stump, he stands and plays away from his body and gets beaten
fullish on middle and leg, Silva turns it to square leg
straighter on the stumps, and its worked into midwicket for a quick single
good length outside off stump, he goes back and opens the face, running it down to third man for one
a tad fuller outside off stump, and he drives loosely and gets beaten

good catch! Banged in short and wide outside off stump, the width was there to go after the stroke, but all Bandara can do is hop up and cut that in the air to point, where Taylor times his jump to perfection and holds a good catch above his head
banged in short outside off stump, and Malinga goes back and leaves it be
full and wide outside off stump, Malinga stands and plays away from his body, and he's nowhere near that one
good length on middle and leg, he looks to tuck it fine but doesnt time it well, getting an inside edge to the off side
full and wide outside off stump, he swings merrily and misses
strays down leg side, and its tucked around the corner to fine leg for one
full and wide outside off stump, he drives and misses, playing well away from his body
take that! Fullish on the stumps, Malinga swings again and times this well, smacking it straight down the ground for four, he just swung through the line and connected well
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Malinga looks to flick it away, inside edge onto the pads

good length delivery down the leg side, Silva goes on the backfoot and glances it to backward square leg, McGlashan fails to collect the throw from the deep and the batsmen get an extra run, sloppy stuff
full outside off stump, driven into the covers
good length on the stumps, defended back to Astle
a good length outside off stump, Malinga stands and pokes at it, and misses
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Malinga reaches for it and chips it to the sweeper cover
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Silva goes on the backfoot and upper cuts it to square third man
gone! Shortish delivery outside off stump, Silva decides to go for the pull, doesnt time it well, and ends up with a bottom-edge straight to the 'keeper
short and wide, cut but straight to Taylor at backward point
good length outside off stump, Fernando backs away and tries to dab it to point, but ends up with an inside edge
good length delivery just outside off stump, Fernando gets right behind and defends it
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Fernando comes on the frontfoot and goes for the drive, inside edges it to fine leg
good length delivery on the off, Fernando goes for the drive again, and gets an outside edge that runs down to third man, lucky
wow! A good length delivery on the stumps, Malinga gets underneath it and slams it over deep mid-wicket for six
full outside the off stump, and thats a nice cover drive for one out to the sweeper
pitched up outside off stump, Fernando opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
good shot! Short of a length delivery outside off stump, Malinga goes on the backfoot and cuts it to square third man and he becomes the innings top-scorer
short of a length delivery on the stumps, Malinga goes on the backfoot and mistimes the pull to mid -wicket

whoah! Full outside off stump, Malinga gets under it and lofts it down to long-off, where the fielder jumps up on the ropes, gets the hands on it, but falls over the boundary in the  process, and though he threw the ball back on the green, the umpire decrees that some part of him was over the ropes, and signals six!
full toss on the stumps, Fernando comes on the frontfoot and drives it to mid wicket
delivery looped up on the off, Malinga comes on the frontfoot and drives it to cover
tossed up on the stumps, Fernando comes on the frontfoot and defends it
flat on middle and leg, driven to mid-wicket
flat outside off stump, down on one knee goes Fernando and swings it to square leg, calls for the run and McCullum at deep square leg fires in a low, flat throw but the run is taken
full outside off stump, and Fernado drives that well over mid-off for four more, what a partnership this is turning out to be!
full toss on middle and leg, Malinga comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long on
good length delivery down the leg, Fernando goes on the backfoot and flicks it to deep mid-wicket
another full toss on the middle and leg, Malinga launches forward and drives it to long on
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Fernando comes on the frontfoot and drives it to deep mid wicket, great placement
speared into the legs, the yorker, and it beats Fernando all ends up, but misses the stumps
all over! Full toss on the stumps, Fernando heaves it on the leg side, it goes high over the infield, but  lands smack in Adams's hands at the deep mid-wicket boundary
yorker length delivery on middle and leg, Malinga looks to drive, and misses
thats that! Tossed up on middle and leg, Malinga looks to slam that over the off side, misses, and the ball hits the top of leg stump!
